channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Credit Card Interest Cap Is a Scam
item.description: The president has no authority to dictate credit card terms, and his price controls would constrain access if enacted.

item.title: Will Canada Abandon Its EV Mandate?
item.description: Liberal politicians like Mark Carney are slowly waking up to voters’ frustration with the expensive climate policies they imposed.

item.title: The Iranian People Are Paying The Price For 50 Years Of Democrats’ Bad Policy

item.title: Final day to select ACA health plans arrives in most states, with no subsidy deal yet
item.description: Thursday was the final day to select an Affordable Care Act health insurance plan across much of the country, as the expiration of federal subsidies d...

item.title: Squatting Isn’t a Housing Policy. It’s Property Theft
item.description: It’s appalling that half of the nation’s states still treat stealing a home as a civil offense.

item.title: RFK Jr. Inverts the Food Pyramid, at Last
item.description: The change is a credit to him and the novel MAHA political coalition.

item.title: U.S. seizes sixth Venezuelan-linked oil tanker before Trump-Machado meeting
item.description: The U.S. has seized an oil tanker that defied President Trump's blockade on sanctioned Venezuelan oil tankers in a predawn mission, federal officials ...

item.title: Trump Is The One Fighting For Women’s Liberation In Iran, Not Western Feminists
item.description: It seems that Western feminists are only interested in discussing women’s rights when they can blame it on Trump or Israel.

item.title: Sen. John Fetterman cheers on Trump's immigration crackdown: 'Round up all the criminals'
item.description: Sen. John Fetterman broke with fellow Democrats to urge federal immigration agents to "round up all the criminals."

item.title: DHS: ICE Agent Ambushed, Assaulted While Arresting Illegal Alien In Minneapolis
item.description: The officer shot the suspect in the leg in self-defense after being beaten with a shovel, the Department of Homeland Security said.

item.title: An Open Letter to John Malone
item.description: Your sale to AT&T was a turning point in our national history.

item.title: Anti-ICE Activists’ Goal Isn’t Stopping Violence — It’s Ending All Immigration Enforcement
item.description: You may not like it, but ICE enforcement is democracy in action.
